knimeNode.name: Linear Discriminant Analysis Inversion
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node inverts a linear discriminant analysis transformation.

fullDescription.intro: This node inverts the transformation applied by the Linear Discriminant Analysis Apply node. Data in the space resulting from the Linear Discriminant Analysis (LDA) are transformed back to the original space. Information that was lost by the LDA transformation cannot be recovered.
fullDescription.option: Select all columns containing the projected data.
If checked, the selected columns are removed in the output table.

option.name: Fail if missing values are encountered

fullDescription.option: If checked, execution fails when the selected columns contain missing values. Otherwise, rows containing missing values are ignored during computation.

ports.inPort: The original model that was used to transform the data.
ports.outPort: The reconstructed data from inverting the LDA transformation, and possibly the input data depending on the configuration.
